duties_responsibilities.duty: Set up and operate complex machines to produce acceptable parts according to specifications.
Trains lower level operators on machine operations.
Read blueprints and shop specifications to ensure completed parts meet the required dimensional tolerances.
Inspect completed cut parts and components for acceptance.
Load and unload material using Overhead and/or Mag Crane.
Ability to follow verbal or simple written instructions and procedures.
Perform general housekeeping/clean up in assigned work area.
Follow all safety processes and procedures.
Maintains and completes all required records.
Ability to function as a team member. Establish and maintain effective working relationships.
